text.div:
This value set contains 3 concepts

Expansion based on http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0116 version 2.9

All codes from system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0116

CodeDisplayDefinition
CClosed
OOccupied
UUnoccupied

resource.name: BedLocationOperationalStatus
resource.title: Bed Location Operational Status
resource.description: This Value Set is used to indicate whether a bed is in use (O), available for use (U), or not available (C) for use.

text.div:
This value set contains 3 concepts

Expansion based on http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/BedType version 0.1.0

All codes from system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/BedType

CodeDisplayDefinition
NEGISONegative Pressure Isolation UnitBeds in a negative pressure isolation environment
OTHISOOther Isolation UnitBeds in an other (non-negative pressure) isolation environment
NONISONon-isolating unitBed in a unit that does not support isolation

resource.name: BedProperty
resource.title: Bed Property
resource.description: This value set describes other properties of a bed, such as the ability to support isolation.

text.div:

Expansion based on http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/GroupSystem version 0.1.0

All codes from system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/GroupSystem

CodeDisplayDefinition
BedsBeds
VentilatorsVentilators
EncountersEncounters

resource.name: Groups
resource.title: Measure Groups
resource.description: Measure Groups defined by the SANER Project

text.div:
This value set contains 3 concepts

Expansion based on http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/MeasureRateAggregation version 0.1.0

All codes from system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/MeasureRateAggregation

CodeDisplayDefinition
aggregable-by-periodAggregableRates can be accumulated over consecutive periods
point-in-timePoint in TimeRates are point in time measures during the reporting period
cumulativeCumulativeRates are point in time measures showing cumulative values over all reporting periods

resource.name: MeasureRateAggregationValues
resource.title: Rate Aggregation Value Set
resource.description: This Value Set Identifies methods of rate aggregation

text.div:
This value set contains 3 concepts

Expansion based on http://hl7.org/fhir/publication-status version 4.0.1

All codes from system http://hl7.org/fhir/publication-status

CodeDisplayDefinition
activeActiveThis resource is ready for normal use.
draftDraftThis resource is still under development and is not yet considered to be ready for normal use.
retiredRetiredThis resource has been withdrawn or superseded and should no longer be used.

resource.name: MeasureStatus
resource.title: Measure Status Values
resource.description: Allowed Status Values for Saner Measures

text.div:
This value set contains 2 concepts

Expansion based on http://hl7.org/fhir/measure-report-status version 4.0.1

All codes from system http://hl7.org/fhir/measure-report-status

CodeDisplayDefinition
completeCompleteThe report is complete and ready for use.
pendingPendingThe report is currently being generated.

resource.name: OnlyCompleteOrPending
resource.description: This valueset is used to limit the reported status to complete or pending for a MeasureReport

text.div:
This value set contains 26 concepts

Expansion based on http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/PopulationSystem version 0.1.0

All codes from system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/saner/CodeSystem/PopulationSystem

CodeDisplayDefinition
numTotBedsAll Hospital BedsTotal number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds, including all staffed,ICU, licensed, and overflow (surge) beds used for inpatients or outpatients
numBedsHospital Inpatient BedsInpatient beds, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow (surge) beds used for inpatients
numBedsOccHospital Inpatient Bed OccupancyTotal number of staffed inpatient beds that are occupied
numICUBedsICU BedsTotal number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds
numICUBedsOccICU Bed OccupancyTotal number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied
numVentMechanical VentilatorsTotal number of ventilators available
numVentUseMechanical Ventilators in UseTotal number of ventilators in use
numC19PatsAll COVID-19 Confirmed or Suspected PatientsPatients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 in any location.
numC19HospPatsHospitalized COVID-19 PatientsPatients currently hospitalized in an inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19
numC19OverflowPatsED/Overflow COVID-19 PatientsPatients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed
numC19HOPatsHospital Onset COVID-19 PatientsPatients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID-19 14 or more days after hospitalization
numC19VentPatsVentilated COVID-19 PatientsPatients in any location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator
numC19MechVentPatsHospitalized and Ventilated COVID-19 PatientsPatients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator
numC19OFMechVentPatsED/Overflow and Ventilated COVID-19 PatientsPatients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator
numC19DiedCOVID-19 Patient DeathsPatients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED, or any overflow location
totalOrdersIncreaseNew Diagnostic Tests Ordered/Received
totalOrdersCumulative Diagnostic Tests Ordered/Recieved
totalTestResultsIncreaseNew Tests Resulted
rejectedCumulative Specimens Rejected*
totalTestResultsCumulative Tests Performed
positiveIncreaseNew Positive COVID-19 Tests
positiveCumulative Positive COVID-19 Tests
positiveIncreasePercentPercent Positive among Newly Resulted Tests
positivePercentCumulative Percent Positive among Resulted Tests
allReportsAll Laboratory Reports for any Order
latestReportsMost Recent Laboratory Reports for any Order

resource.name: Populations
resource.title: Measure Populations
resource.description: Measure Populations defined by The SANER Project

contains.display: All COVID-19 Confirmed or Suspected Patients
Percent Positive among Newly Resulted Tests
Cumulative Percent Positive among Resulted Tests
